title: Infra Signal Ingestion Normalizer
reason: We need this skill because long-term scale depends on resilient and sustainable infrastructure choices. This specific skill stabilizes noisy upstream inputs before they contaminate planning.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Infra Signal Ingestion Normalizer`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to capacity collapse and environmental debt.
Design and version the input/output contract for capacity forecasts, energy usage, and sustainability metrics, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using schema mapping and validation, and produce normalized signal feeds with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover capacity collapse and environmental debt, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.
